Articles.Content:
Hello, im completely new around the forums!

And to be honest, also completely new at being in a forum community thing, so a little help might be good!

I started a letsplay series a while ago and I thought id share it here!

I specifically aim to also include the build process and stuff into the videos and whenever new things come along I try to elaborate a little on them so the videos are understandable for non ksp players too. Its basically me blabbering about the game and interesting stuff for 20 minutes an episode

This is a link to the playlist on my channel  .... be sure to check it out if youre interested and tell me what you think!
series ended, decided to start fresh with a more modded but still quite mild install  doing a kerbalism and interstellar extended exploration styled career playthrough now
